entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [browser] addons.xpi ERROR System addon update list error SyntaxError: XMLHttpRequest.open: 'http://%(server)s/dummy-system-addons.xml' is not a valid URL. #104580
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.CancelSendPingAsync fails on osx.1200.amd64.open #104574
  • JIT: "Never-negative" handling is not implemented for Span length fields promoted by physical promotion #104573
  • [8.0] Failure in `System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterTests.PerformanceCounter_Increment`: Category 'PerformanceCounter_Increment_Category' does not exist. #104572
  • JIT: Not all return buffers are marked with DNER when we get to regular promotion #104571
    10.0.0
  • superpmi-replay failing with `Assertion failed 'emitCurIG != emitPrologIG'` #104570
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests.NativeBuild_WithDeployOnBuild_UsedByVS tests failing on restore for nuget package #104569
  • Test failure in System.IO.Tests.Directory_NotifyFilter_Tests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_NotifyFilter_ModifyAndCreate #104564
  • Unexpected and undocumented (performance) pitfall in BufferedStream.WriteByte #104559
  • [Windows ARM] Building libraries from Visual Studio results in an x64 compiler being used #104548
    Future
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SocketOptionNameTest failures on Qemu #104547
    Future
  • CoreLib configuration picker lists too many architectures and selects the wrong default #104546
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.KeepAliveTest failures on Qemu #104545
    Future
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.ArgumentValidation failures on Qemu #104542
    Future
  • [wasm] Don't rely specific configuration name #104540
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Recognize more addressing modes #104538
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Duplicate AOT/Trimmer warnings for console apps #104374
  • UnsafeAccessor throws MissingFieldException on generic types #104268
  • Using trimming functionality to identify dead code #104405
  • [mono] set alc collectible #98649
  • Question: how to pass string pointer without Marshal to NativeAOT dylib ? #100481
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/generics/Instantiation/Positive/MultipleInterface04/MultipleInterface04.sh #91099
    9.0.0
  • "Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces, Version=1.0.0.0" in tests on Debian #102213
  • [8.0][osx] Test failure: ILLink.Tasks.Tests.TaskArgumentTests.TestRootDescriptorFiles #101833
  • Test failure Interop/COM/NETClients/Primitives/NETClientPrimitives/NETClientPrimitives.cmd #95842
  • .NET 9 Host Improvements #97931
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose overloads of HttpContent.LoadIntoBufferAsync taking a CancellationToken #102659
    9.0.0
  • Issue with COM Interop in VB6 After Migrating from .NET 4.8 to .NET 8 #103656
  • HttpClient spans don't show up as exemplars #103893
    9.0.0
  • Change in exception handling in 9.0 #101772
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 4/16/2024 8:34:24 PM #101247
    9.0.0
  • Build fails with "eng/common/tools.sh: line 474: 537 Segmentation fault" #76759
    9.0.0
  • Epic: Trimming and Native AOT in .NET 9 #96511
    9.0.0
  • LinkerArg doesn't seem to work on net8.0-macos NativeAOT app #97414
    9.0.0
  • Wasm build failure in System.Text.Json.Tests - The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly #104004
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_12224\\Test12224\\Test12224.cmd #79581
  • Size of source-build intermediate packages have increased significantly #92240
    9.0.0
  • Crossbuilding armv6 fails on Alpine Linux #77663
  • Test failure _ParallelCrashTester::ParallelCrashTester.ParallelCrashMainThreadAndWorkerThreads() #94393
  • `JsonNode.DeepEquals()` erroneously considers number representation #97490
    Future
  • PropertyDescriptor.AddValueChanged is not thread-safe #102136
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed under System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CheckDefaultProvider #104221
    9.0.0
  • Changes in the code while its process is running #104509
  • Base64url tests fail on s390x (big endian) #104283
    9.0.0
  • Test time out for global::Test_refarg_f8_cs.App.TestEntryPoint() in gcstress0x3-gcstress0xc #104319
    9.0.0
  • runtime-coreclr gcstress0x3-gcstress0xc has been failing for the past month #104062
    9.0.0
  • WasmTestOnChrome-* test failures #103057
  • [wasi] Extract minimal build infrastructure to WasmSDK #103038
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Playwright failing #94240
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Build - better integrate with `publish` #83108
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTlsResumeTests.ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds failing on windows #103409
    9.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #91304
    9.0.0
  • Question on how to properly set OdbcType for OdbcParameter #104537
  • [browser] Add test case for `maxParallelDownloads` #96016
    9.0.0
  • [RyuJit/x64] Generates extra movsxd when using a byte value as an address offset #8465
    Future
  • Add first class System.Threading.Lock type #34812
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [Android] Link native shared libraries with 16k page alignment #104577
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add the new Lock type to Concurrent Dicionary #104575
    area-System.Collections
  • ILLink: Rebuild override info after custom step runs #104566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104565
    needs-area-label
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update solution files to include all CoreLib dependencies #104561
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading
  • [browser] host should not forward env variables #104557
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.Scatter() #104555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove unused test server deployment scripts #104553
    area-System.Net
  • [mono][infra] Remove Mono LLVMJIT builds #104552
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Handle retbuf definitions precisely in physical promotion's liveness #104551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JsonSchemaExporterContext.BaseTypeInfo #104550
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Fix `ItemGroup` concatenation in wasi #104549
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [release/8.0-staging] use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #104541
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [browser][MT] troubleshooting deadlocks #104539
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix a potential out-of-bound read in RuntimeInvokeHostAssemblyResolver #104536
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Merged

  • Revert "Add more complete linux build instructions" #104581
    needs-area-label
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime (second attempt) #104454
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Update pr-guide with staleness requirement #104576
    needs-area-label
  • Add CancellationToken support for LoadIntoBufferAsync #103991
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104416
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Propagate physical promotion liveness in post-order #104554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Swap MetricsHandler and DiagnosticsHandler #104455
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Clean up JSON property lookup logic and add alternate key lookup support. #103836
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Ensure EH clauses with same try region are reported contiguously to the VM #104531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #103076
    NO-MERGE, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix cross-compiling CoreCLR from macOS arm64 to x64 #104556
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #104417
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Improve `JsonNode.DeepEquals` numeric equality. #104255
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Use ConcurrentDictionary to avoid threading issues #104407
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Delete dead AVX detection code in vm #104544
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary endianness dependent logic #104332
    area-System.Memory
  • [cdac] start of RuntimeTypeSystem contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Refactor WinHttpHandler test to use LoopbackServer.CreateClientAndServer #104400
    area-System.Net
  • Handle top-level UseSystemLibs argument from the VMR #104440
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations in Quic/HTTP3 #104394
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Re-try when browser's WBT fail with `System.TimeoutException` #104481
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [wasi] enable WASMTIME_BACKTRACE_DETAILS #104446
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Add test case for `maxParallelDownloads` #104476
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2490843 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Assertion prop equivalent phis #104458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix syntax of exports file with no exported symbols on Linux #104339
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Check for `IDispatch` properly #104406
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono] [swift-interop] Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104501
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.x
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface2::GetObjectExceptionData #104343
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Start Loader contract and implement ISOSDacInterface::GetModuleData in cDAC #104257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix type parsing issues in ILLink and ILC #104060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Support retbuf optimization for non 'lvIsTemp' locals #104467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Allow LARGE_REGION_FACTOR to be configurable #104403
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • NativeAOT/win/arm64: Fix the reloc type typo #104516
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [8.0] Add a config flag to experiment with some work item prioritization changes in cases involving a lot of sync-over-async #103984
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • [Android] Resolve Android-specific active issues in System.Net.Security and System.Security.Cryptography #104352
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104514
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ignore type resolution failures when filtering for custom attributes with a sealed type. #104530
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Only ship runtime packs that are classified as mobile targets #104307
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Only build applicable build Tasks when building the repo #104226
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Revert "[wasm] Intrinsics for blazor" #103774
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Test HybridGlobalization with AOT on CI #104027
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [QUIC&H/3] QuicConnection handshake timeout #104358
    area-System.Net.Http
  • In Dns.RunAsync calls AfterResolution when canceled #104435
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `CallArg::m_tmpNum` #104429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up procfs.h mess on sunos and illumos #104304
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [QUIC] Fixed some tests leaking unobserved exceptions #104444
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use `GetArrayDataReference` in `Vector*` #104532
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Fix handling SECBUFFER_EXTRA with renegotiation after handshake. #103419
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Apple-Mobile][Globalization] Refactoring of CalendarData.iOS and new DateTimeFormatInfo* tests #102464
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • [build.ps1] Set the default architecture using an environment variable #104474
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: revert SetWindowSize implementation. #100272
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Don't call fcntl on an invalid file descriptor. #104535
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • illumos: set default timezone info path #104533
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] DotnetJS exception on marshalled c#-objects finalizer call #2625

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • Take the .NET CLI Survey to help shape the future of .NET Tooling #42024
  • string.Compare(InvariantCulture) returns different result as .Net Framework #42014
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9 preview 7 sdk installed, Running winforms/wpf failed in CLI. #42012

Closed

  • Question about msbuild dependencies #2310
    Discussion
  • NoWarn the new .NET SDK netstandard1.x warning doesn't work #41787
  • Update version of MSTest used in tests #42015

PullRequests

Created

  • Testing sbrp changes #42028
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Add certificate content type checking to Signature.cs #42025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove RIDS in CompareMsftToSbAssemblyVersions test #42022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload VM test improvements #42021
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41929
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix 15 packages to track their own versions through darc #41890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix duplicate endpoints when resolving referenced asset endpoints #41995
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Documentation to fix issues when running `zsh` #41668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump MSTest version from 2.0.0 to 3.4.3 #42016
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Pass along top-level UseSystemLibs option to runtime #41984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update VMR codespace READMEs #42017
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24357.1 #42007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Obtain internal runtime SAS tokens via federated creds #41797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • JsonPropertyPostAction: allow to create file and path #41959
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Plan for addressing torn SDK builds #41790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix detection of torn SDK #41907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Object initializer updates #8253
  • Start proposal for more constant types #8257

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection Expressions: Extra array copy when spreading `IEnumerable<T>` to `Span<T>`. #74292

Closed

  • Solution.WithDocumentFilePath doesn't take a non-null path even though documents can have null paths #37125
    Backlog
  • Compiler has poor error recovery when encountering nullable types in pattern locations #72720
    Backlog
  • Rename tracking doesn't work on positional members #44560
    Backlog
  • TestFindAllReferencesAsync_Streaming failed in CI #74284
  • Can't use latest main: 19b5e961ecb97b008106f1b646c077e0bffde4a7 #74286

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SourceCodeKind setting #74294
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74291
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • With project info #74289
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable running in ARM64-native mode on .NET Framework. #74285
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid reporting redundant and possibly misleading WRN_InlineArrayNotSupportedByLanguage #74283
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Additional tests for `ref struct interfaces` feature #74282
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Consolidate test Span sources #74281
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow services to use System.Text.Json for OOP comms in Razor #74280

Merged

  • Fix style binding failure in Document Outline #74263
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Allow Document.FilePath to be set to null #74290
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove fallbacks: IdeAnalyzerOptions #74235
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix msbuild issue #74293
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Syntax formatting options #74223
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix scenario where lightbulbs weren't being displayed #74277
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74288
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2490585 #74287
    auto-merge
  • 17.11: Add weak heuristics in our designer scanning code to improve experience during things like configuration switch. #74152
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix ID for telemetry logging in on the fly docs #74276
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't reference netstandard1.x packages #74199
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Switch implicit span to conversion from type #74232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Improve performance of SourceText.LineInfo indexer. #74267
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust lowering of a string interpolation in an expression lambda to not use expanded non-array `params` collection in Format/Create calls. #74274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Escape `record` keywords #74227
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • skip default value assignment #74231
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Fix modification of readonly locals through ref fields #74255
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Restore client-side state after failing to reconnect to the circuit #56678
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [CG] Update spa-templates npm dependencies #56674
  • No error when calling a post api in .net 7.20 #56672
  • Perf regression: fortunes #56671
  • Give us an option to enable loose binding for invalid data and providing default values for invalid properties in JSON in HTTP Post #56663
  • Can't use custom parsers with [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #56662
    Backlog

Closed

  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24353.17] The "ResolvedCompressedAssessts" task failed unexpectedly. #56664
  • Better reconnection logic for Blazor Server #32113
    9.0-preview5
  • SignalR: Using IAsyncEnumerable<T> and ChannelReader<T> with ValueTypes in native AOT #56179
    9.0-preview7
  • Add overloads for validation problem results that accept IReadOnlyDictionary<string, string[]> #41899
    Backlog
  • [API Proposal]: Add new constructor for `HttpValidationProblemDetails` that accepts a `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, string[]>>` #56370
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json, mvc #56620
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #56649

PullRequests

Created

  • [CG[ Update ws dep in release/8.0 #56677
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • [CG] Update ws dep in release/6.0 #56676
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm package cache 2024-07-08 #56673

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Span text-decoration is incorrect whereas the Label behaves properly #23488
  • DateTime.MinValue.ToUniversalTime incorrect time #23485
  • TabbedPage Clear and Adding existing page does not display across the entire screen [iOS] #23484
  • One frame flyout bug on a tab bar menu #23483
  • Inconsistence Frame Padding #23482
  • InvalidOperationException on MauiPage when runing in debug #23480
  • MAUI Android System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_ConcurrentOperationsNotSupported #23479

Closed

  • Enable CSS for VerticalStackLayout and HorizontalStackLayout #21843
    Backlog
  • Drawer icon shows when going back #23486
  • iOS AppDelegate - Overrides for handling remote notifications not available #23451
    9.0-preview7
  • Scrolling on a List View causes massive memory leak #23406
    Backlog
  • MaterialIconsOutlined-Regular in Release version doesn't work #23255
  • Confirmation box cannot open in Mac Catalyst #23110
  • MAUI Picker Behavior Discrepancy Between Material Design PickerField and Standard Picker in Xamarin.Forms Tab Navigation #23256
  • Maui not building in Azure pipeline #23252

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not solely make Visual Diagnostics available on debugger being attached #23490
  • [windows] fix VisualDiagnosticsOverlay keeping Page's alive #23489
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦

Merged

  • Stable branding for .NET 8 SR7 #23487
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate remote notification methods #23452

Updated

  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨, area-controls-window
  • [android]: ModalContainer Destroy commit allowing state loss #23400
    community ✨
  • Fix iOS log exports #23334
    area-infrastructure
  • Support the new RIDs on WinUI #23247
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Validate that derived types aren't mapped to a different container. #34189
    Backlog
  • Report precompiled query generation progress #34188
    Backlog
  • Validate against JSON inheritance mapping, which isn't supported yet #34184
    9.0.0
  • SQL truncated at lines starting with "go" in migrationBuilder.Sql #34183
  • All providers: warn when attempting to save entity with CLR default key value #34181
    Backlog
  • Cosmos: error when attempting to save entity with CLR default key value #34180
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Use 1:1 mapping for .NET `Id` to JSON `id` unless explicitly configured otherwise #34179
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Construct IDesignTimeDbContextFactory without first discovering all DbContext types #27322
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite - .NET8 iOS #34182
  • Non-Nullable String Column added after table creation also adds default value #34178

PullRequests

Created

  • Cosmos: Redo ReadItem and partition key management #34187

Merged

  • Don't use service discovery for DbContext types if corresponding IDesignTimeDbContextFactory implementations are found. #34082

Updated

  • Implement `IS [NOT] DISTINCT FROM` translation #34048
  • Add UnsafeAccessor support for generic types #34146
  • Lock the database while executing Migrate() #34115
